title: scATAC-seq library complexity quality metric
description: Schema for scATAC-seq library complexity quality metrics

NRF.title: Non-redundant fraction
NRF.description: Non-redundant fraction (indicates library complexity).  Number of distinct unique mapping reads (i.e. after removing duplicates) / Total number of reads

PBC1.title: PCR bottlenecking coefficient 1
PBC1.description: PCR Bottlenecking coefficient 1 = M1/M_DISTINCT where M1: number of genomic locations where exactly one read maps uniquely, M_DISTINCT: number of distinct genomic locations to which some read maps uniquely

PBC2.title: PCR bottlenecking coefficient 2
PBC2.description: PCR Bottlenecking coefficient 2 (indicates library complexity) = M1/M2 where M1: number of genomic locations where only one read maps uniquely and M2: number of genomic locations where 2 reads map uniquely

paired_duplicate_reads.title: Paired duplicate reads
paired_duplicate_reads.description: Number of paired duplicate reads before duplicate filtering

paired_optical_duplicate_reads.title: Paired optical duplicate reads
paired_optical_duplicate_reads.description: Number of paired optical duplicates before duplicate filtering

paired_reads.title: Number of paired reads before duplicate filtering
paired_reads.description: Number of paired reads before duplicate filtering

frac_duplicate_reads.title: Fraction of duplicate reads
frac_duplicate_reads.description: Fraction of duplicate reads before duplicate filtering

positions_with_one_read.title: Number of positions with one read
positions_with_one_read.description: Locations with one mapped read before duplicate filtering

positions_with_two_reads.title: Number of positions with two reads
positions_with_two_reads.description: Locations with two mapped reads before duplicate filtering

total_fragments.title: Total number of fragments
total_fragments.description: Number of fragments before duplicate filtering

unpaired_duplicate_reads.title: Unpaired duplicate reads
unpaired_duplicate_reads.description: Number of unpaired duplicates before duplicate filtering

unpaired_reads.title: Unpaired reads
unpaired_reads.description: Number of unpaired reads before duplicate filtering

unmapped_reads.title: Unmapped reads
unmapped_reads.description: Number of unmapped reads before duplicate filtering

href.comment: Internal webapp URL for document file
Internal webapp URL for document file
